contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Grips-theater.berlin-hansaplatz.II.JPG|thumb|The Grips-Theater at Hansaplatz in Berlin]] The '''Grips-Theater''' in [[Berlin]], [[Germany]] is a well-known and well-respected [[theater]] for [[child]]ren and [[youth]] located at the [[Hansaviertel|Hansaplatz]]. It was here that the popular musical ''[[Linie 1]]'' originated, the title referring to a subway line, Line No 1, running through Berlin.<ref>{{cite web | last = | first = | authorlink = | coauthors = | title = Grips-Theatre | work = | publisher = Visit Berlin | date = | url = http://www.visitberlin.de/en/spot/grips-theater| format = | doi = | accessdate = 26 May 2013 | archiveurl = | archivedate = }}</ref><ref>{{cite web | last = | first = | authorlink = | coauthors = | title = Grips-Theatre | work = | publisher = Goethe Institut, Germany | date = | url = http://www.goethe.de/kue/the/kjt/kjt/bue/en8428731.htm | format = | doi = | accessdate = 26 May 2013 | archiveurl = | archivedate = }}</ref> ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.grips-theater.de Information in German] {{coord|52|31|7|N|13|20|31|E|type:landmark_region:DE-BE_source:dewiki|display=title}} [[Category:Theatres in Berlin]] {{theat-struct-stub}}
